SIGN_IN_WELCOME.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Hyperlink NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:urlOnSignIn_Welcome_Image]'/></Hyperlink></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.25'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='White'>Welcome to Plex-Earth 2025!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get the best view of your project area.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}'><Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'>Click here to learn more</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
SIGN_IN_WELCOME.title: Welcome to Plex-Earth 2025
